SELECT T.ID, T.MAIN_ID, T.MEMBER_ID, T.CPON_ID, m.member_name, m.real_name, m.mobile FROM QKJVIP_MEMBER_CPONSON T join qkjvip_member m on (T.member_id=m.member_id) WHERE 1=1 --(m.statusflag = 0 OR m.statusflag = 2)
AND T.NAME LIKE '%${params.name}%'
AND T.MAIN_ID = '${params.mainId}'
AND T.member_id = '${params.memberId}'
